title: Championship Weekend Picks And Preview (Football 01/19)
description:
Nick Kostos, Will Brinson, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora link up for a championship Friday edition of the Pick Six podcast. The guys discuss ongoing drama within the Steelers' organization and coaching vacancies across the league, before diving into a preview of championship matchups between the Patriots and Jaguars, and Eagles and Vikings. Listen for Nick, Will, Pete, and Jason's analysis and picks against the spread!
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
